name: webssh2-server
description: A Websocket to SSH2 gateway using xterm.js, socket.io, ssh2

scripts.test: npm run build && WEBSSH2_SKIP_NETWORK=1 npx tsx scripts/run-node-tests.mts
scripts.test:js: npm run build && WEBSSH2_SKIP_NETWORK=1 node scripts/run-node-tests.mjs
scripts.test:ts: npm run build && WEBSSH2_SKIP_NETWORK=1 npx tsx scripts/run-node-tests.mts
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.check:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.progress: echo 'Migration progress script removed; see DOCS/CONSTANTS.md and ts-migration-progress.md if present.'
scripts.test:all: npm run build && WEBSSH2_SKIP_NETWORK=0 npx tsx scripts/run-node-tests.mts
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && cd ../webssh2_client && npm run build && cd ../webssh2 && ENABLE_E2E_SSH=1 playwright test -c playwright.config.ts tests/playwright
scripts.test:e2e:debug: npm run build && cd ../webssh2_client && npm run build && cd ../webssh2 && ENABLE_E2E_SSH=1 E2E_DEBUG=webssh2:* playwright test -c playwright.config.ts tests/playwright
scripts.test:performance:report: echo 'Performance reporting will be available after test reimplementation'
scripts.release: npm run lint:fix && npm run test && standard-version -a -s --release-as patch --commit-all --infile ChangeLog.md
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && echo 'Consider running: trivy fs .'
scripts.security:socket: echo 'Install socket.dev CLI and run: socket.dev cli scan'
